roleData.title: Community-Focused Full-stack Developer
roleData.description: I  am developing a Chrome extension designed to enhance on-screen reading accessibility. This is a community-driven project, created in collaboration with the visually impaired community and Northeastern University.

roleData.title: Software Engineer Intern
roleData.description: I developed a web application that allows users to consult our medical AI. I was responsible for setting up the backend API and building the frontend web interface.
